document_data.caption: A map showing the Blackwash Fens in the northwestern region of the Land of the Yak-Men.
document_data.name: Blackwash Fens
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blackwash Fens''' was a boggy lowland area found along the coast of the [[Great Sea]] in the far northern reaches of [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Geography: The fens were located in the [[Sun's Eye]] province of the [[Yikarian Empire]] on the banks of the [[River Ruin]] at the edge of [[Pearl Bay]] near the city of [[Lipo]]. The fens were created by the heavy rainfall the region experienced. The depth of the fens was determined by both the tides of the Great Sea and the current state of the River Ruin.
